quotes.text: It's over 9000!!
quotes.author: Vegeta

quotes.text: I am a leaf on the wind - watch how I soar.
quotes.author: Wash

quotes.text: Mundo goes where he pleases.
quotes.author: Dr. Mundo

quotes.text: Say 'What' Again!
quotes.author: Jules Winnfield

quotes.text: Say my name.
quotes.author: Heisenberg

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Enjoy life. There’s plenty of time to be dead.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.text: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it is worth watching.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The past is never dead. It's not even past.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.text: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
E.M. Forster
quotes.text: Only connect.

quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quotes.text: The test of a first-rate intelligence is the ability to hold two opposed ideas in mind at the same time and still retain the ability      to function.

quotes.author: Richard Buckminster Fuller
quotes.text: To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.text: Be water, my friend.

quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill
quotes.text: You can always count on Americans to do the right thing—after they've tried everything else.

quotes.author: Niccoló Machiavelli
quotes.text: Make mistakes of ambition and not mistakes of sloth. Develop the strength to do bold things, not the strength to suffer

quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso, the 14th Dalai Lama
quotes.text: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
If you even dream of beating me you'd better wake up and apologize.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Be the change you want to see in the World.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: We should all start to live before we get to old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: To be or not to be
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Please do not deplore yourself. Even if the world does not forgive you, I will forgive you. Please do not deplore yourself. Even if you do not forgive the world, I will forgive you. So please tell me. What will it take for you, to forgive me?
quotes.author: Frederica Bernkastel  (Ryukishi07)

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Inside every cynical person, there is a disappointed idealist.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: There is no terror in the bang, only in the anticipation of it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.text: Don't fear failure. Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts, it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: What to do when life gives you lemons: don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back. Get mad! Yell - I don't want your damn lemons!. Then demand to see life's manager, then burn down their house.
quotes.author: Cave Johnson

quotes.text: Man cannot remake himself without suffering for he is both the marble and the sculptor.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.text: No
quotes.author: Rosa parks

quotes.text: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.text: Go to heaven for the climate, Hell for the company
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: A womans mind is cleaner then a man's: She changes it more often.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: If shit can rise to the top of the toilet... Why can't you?
quotes.author: Josip Injic

quotes.text: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
quotes.author: - Kevin Kruse

quotes.text: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: - Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: - John Wooden

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: - Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
quotes.author: - Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: - Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Be yourself, everyone else is already taken
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the universe
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul
quotes.author: Cicero
Ben Franklin
quotes.text: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.

quotes.author: Thomas Paine
quotes.text: These are the times that try mens souls.

quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
quotes.text: The most valuable of all talents is that of never using two words when one will do.

quotes.author: George Washington
quotes.text: It is better to offer no excuse than a bad one.

quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton
quotes.text: I never expect a perfect work from an imperfect man.
It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: A good plan, violently executed now, is better than a perfect plan next week.
quotes.author: George Patton

quotes.text: If everyone is thinking alike, then no one is thinking.
quotes.author: George S.P.

quotes.text: Good tactics can save even the worst strategy. Bad tactics will destroy even the best strategy.
quotes.author: George S. Pat.

quotes.text: I always believe in being prepared, even when I'm dressed in white tie and tails.
quotes.author: G.S. Patton

quotes.text: Live for something rather than die for nothing.
quotes.author: G.S.P.

quotes.text: "Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first."
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: "A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools."
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: "The more one listens to ordinary conversations the more apparent it becomes that the reasoning faculties of the brain take little part in the direction of the vocal organs."
quotes.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quotes.text: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it."
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: "Some people see things that are and ask, Why? Some people dream of things that never were and ask, Why not? Some people have to go to work and don't have time for all that"
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: "Most people seem to take pleasure in feeling superior to someone. I'm not like that, which pleases me because it makes me feel superior."
quotes.author: Steven Brust

quotes.text: "Honour, eh? What the hell is that anyway? Every man thinks it's something different. You can't drink it. You can't f**k it. The more of it you have the less good it does you, and if you've got none at all you don't miss it."
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie
